summary: Start your adventure as a young dark elf spellsword who has fled from Morrowind after Vvardenfell\'s eruption.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/3831/vvardenfellescapetitle.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/4652/vvardenfellescapemainpi.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/220/vvardenfellescapedivide.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=orange][b]STORYLINE[/color][/b]
You are dark elf named Damon. You have grew up in Morrowind, in the city of Balmora under the care of your only known relative - uncle Vraalen. He was a local alchemist and learned you a lot about creating useful elixirs and potions. Beside this, as being a dark elf, you was always interested in sword & magic way. Your uncle couldn\'t stop you from continuous escapes from home just for some adventures. During one of those rambles, Vvardenfell mountain erupted and almost completely destroyed Morrowind. Even Balmora was razed to the ground. After this awful distaster you knew that you have no more future here, so you decided to ride to the west... to the province of Skyrim. With your comprehensive skills and nothing to lose, maybe you will finally realize your dream about being independent adventurer. Anyway, you have to survive now in this unfriendly and cold country. Oh, and your horse is dead beacuse of exhaustion. Good luck.

[color=orange][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/color]
You start with almost nothing in your inventory. You have to gain all items and experience as a dark elf. You decide what to do - from this time it\'s completly your game. Just roleplay it. The main quest is disabled. You have no markers on your map. You dont know nothing about the Helgen dragon incident.

[color=orange][b]INFORMATION[/color][/b]
You start at the Morrowind gate near Riften
Main quest is disabled (open the console and type \"setstage MQ102 30\" if you want to enable it)
You don\'t have any map markers - you have to discover everything by yourself
Damon is level 1 and his skills is different than standard due to his previously life

[b][color=orange]INSTALLATION[/b][/color]
Unrar & extract the save file into the following location:
WIN 7 / Vista - C:\\Users\\[UserName]\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
WIN XP - C:\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves

[center][img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/7429/vvardenfellescapesecond.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Mindwalker
